q: Fiat, whose brands include Ferrari, Maserati and Alfa Romeo. News) Chairman Ferdinand Piech expressed an interest in buying Alfa Romeo. But Friday, Sergio Marchionne flatly rejected any sale of Alfa Romeo to VW. As long as I'm the CEO of both Fiat and Chrysler, Mr. Ferdinand Piech will never get an offer, Sergio Marchionne said during the J.D. Power event. Sergio Marchionne also said Fiat is looking to "redimension" its joint venture with Indian automaker Tata Motors( BSE: TAMO.BO- News)

Among veterans nationally, the rate is 15 percent overall and 20 percent for younger veterans who've served less than five years, Kirsten Gillibrand said. For the men and women who literally risked their lives, giving everything of themselves to defend our country and our freedom, I think going that extra mile really does matter. And I think we should because their unemployment is that much greater, Kirsten Gillibrand said. U.S. Senator Kirsten Gillibrand spoke during a roundtable discussion about the employment future of military veterans held at the Southside Innovation Center. The senator is working with Senate Veterans Committee Chairwoman Patty Murray , D-Washington,
